mapper.select: SELECT seq, title, memo, memo_type AS memoType, use_cl AS useCl, public_level AS publicLevel, use_type AS useType, depth, super_seq AS superSeq, yid, DATE_FORMAT(regdt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS regdt, DATE_FORMAT(upddt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS upddt FROM tb_memo WHERE use_cl = 'Y' ORDER BY seq DESC
